attributes.action: Stop the goverment taking our rights away signing the WHO pandemic treaty
attributes.additional_details: We are a sovereign nation that does not need global interference from global governing bodies.
attributes.background: We do not want our rights taken away by the WHO in regards to pandemic situations.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about the prospect of the UK entering into an international agreement that affects the rights of UK citizens. However, there is currently no treaty for the UK Government to sign, or refuse to sign.

The World Health Assembly has agreed to start a global process to draft and negotiate a convention, agreement or other international instrument under the Constitution of the World Health Organization to strengthen pandemic prevention, preparedness and response. You can find out more about this here: https://www.who.int/news/item/01-12-2021-world-health-assembly-agrees-to-launch-process-to-develop-historic-global-accord-on-pandemic-prevention-preparedness-and-response
